sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import {Candidate} from "../../model/candidate"; @Component({ selector: 'app-candidate-detail-view', templateUrl: './candidateDetailView.html', styleUrls: ['./candidateDetailView.css'] }) export class CandidateDetailView { pageStatus:string = "recruiter"; candidate:Candidate = new Candidate(); // Method to handle file selection for resume and otherFile inputs onFileSelected(event: any, field: string) { const selectedFile = event.target.files[0]; // Depending on the field parameter, assign the selected file to the corresponding property if (field === 'resume') { this.candidate.resume = selectedFile; } else if (field === 'otherFile') { this.candidate.otherFile = selectedFile; } } onSubmit(){ } chanegStatus(s:string) { this.pageStatus = s; } }
Candidate Information
RecruiterName:
